description: Trevor Wright is an intense sort of guy with interests that run the gamut. An ex-high school football player and volunteer fire fighter, this is one model who shows he's not afraid to get a little dirty in order to get the job done. Here we catch up with him for a candid look into his private life, and then our cameras stick around to eavesdrop on a very up close and personal session underneath the red lights. title: Trevor Wright
